stripped_text: When you install this hardware, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Use this hardware only during encounters with that ice. trash: Break up to 2 subroutines. When this run ends, if it was successful, you may shuffle 1 copy of Boomerang from your heap into your stack.
text: When you install this hardware, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Use this hardware only during encounters with that ice. [trash]: Break up to 2 subroutines. When this run ends, if it was successful, you may shuffle 1 copy of Boomerang from your heap into your stack.
title: Boomerang
